snippet: Netflix says filmmaker Judd Apatow co-created a new series that will take a frank, comic look at modern relationships....

headline.print_headline: Netflix Gets 'Love' Comedy From Judd Apatow
headline.main: Netflix Gets 'Love' Comedy From Judd Apatow

lead_paragraph: Netflix says filmmaker Judd Apatow co-created a new series that will take a frank, comic look at modern relationships.
